e: ￹`O~ `tihi~ `ako~ `cingra~ `a~ `ma~`tayal~.￺He works next to me.￻他是我的同事
￹`Ma~`tatihi~ `kami~ `a~ `maro'~.￺We sat next to each other.￻我們坐在一起
￹`Pa~`tihi~`en~ `kako~ `a~ `tayra~ `i~ `loma'~ `nira~.￺Keep me company / go withme to his home.￻你陪我去他家
￹`Mala~`tihi~ `ako~ `cingra~ `i~ `ka~`lasofitayan~.￺He was my companion in the military.￻他是我當兵的伙伴
￹`Ma~`satatihi~ `ko~ `pi~`pateli~.￺The thing is off balance.￻東西安置的不平衡
